properties.headline: Avalanche Warning issued January 7 at 8:06AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
The following message is transmitted at the request of the Forest
Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID

...The Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint
ID has issued a Backcountry Avalanche Warning...

* Timing...In effect until 7 AM MST Wednesday.

* Affected Area...St. Regis Basin in Lookout Pass Zone,
Kootenay/Cabinet MT Zone.

* Avalanche Danger...The avalanche danger for the warning area
will rise today. It is currently rated at HIGH.

* Reason/Impacts...Recent heavy snow combined with wind will
result in widespread avalanching. Expect unstable snow
conditions in the backcountry.
properties.instruction:
Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Travel in avalanche terrain
is not recommended. Avalanches may run long distances and can run
into mature forests, valley floors, or flat terrain.

Consult http://www.idahopanhandleavalanche.org for more detailed
information.

Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the
coverage area of any Avalanche Center.
